title: クラクラ、メラメラ、負けられない

text_block_list.name: News Caster
text_block_list.text: 'Mihono Bourbon, who was active in this year's classic races, has decided to take a long-term break due to injury.'

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh...!
That shocking news came right after the 'Kikuka Sho' ended.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I brought apples and bananas too! I'll leave them here!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Get well soon, and then let's compete again in the senior class!

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...I'm sorry, I can't guarantee yet if I'll be able to return to racing.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Actually, my doctor told me this injury might take a while to heal. So, um...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I-It's...! It's okay, I'm sure you'll get better!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: After all, you know, mindset is important, so try to stay positive... okay?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...Yes. I appreciate your concern.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: ...By the way, how is Rice-san doing?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh!? R-Rice-san is, umm...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: O-Of course, she's, uh, full of energy!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Maa... I messed up. I lied on the spur of the moment.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...It would've been nice if Rice-san could've visited too, huh.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Um, about Rice-san... it might be difficult for her today. She's feeling really down.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: ...She thinks Bourbon-san's injury might be her fault.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whaaat!? Th-That can't be true!

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: I think so too. ...Actually, I have a feeling that's not the only reason she's down.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Well... Rice-san, during the Classic campaign, she was always chasing after Bourbon-san.

text_block_list.name: Zenno Rob Roy
text_block_list.text: Suddenly losing the Umamusume she was aiming for might have left her at a loss.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Bourbon-san seemed worried too, so I want to do something to help.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, I wonder what I should do~.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, it's Nature. I wonder what's up.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hello, hello~.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Taaaaaa!!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa, Nature's all fired up~. Whew.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Tannhauser! Thanks for coming even though you were out!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: No problem at all! I was planning to do some solo training anyway. But why suddenly run alongside me?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah... Well, you see.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...I've been encouraged by you many times before, you know.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Was I encouraging you...?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: You don't remember? ...Like when I was feeling down after watching Teio and McQueen's mock race—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...I really need to learn from that part of you.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Also, before the 'Kikuka-sho' when they said there was no main star, when I was troubled—

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Maybe aim to win with such force that no one can say 'if Teio were here'!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...Huh?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's the only way I think! Win by a landslide! Then it'll be a grand finale.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: And, I guess that really helped, you know? Like, it made me able to push through.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...And then, for the next 'Arima Kinen', I'm running with Tokai Teio.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I want to give it my all in the 'Arima Kinen'. I want to prove that I can do it too.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: And before that 'Arima Kinen'—I want to have a match with you, one of the Umamusume I respect the most!
Nice Nature slapped Matikanetannhauser's back with a thud.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Whoa!?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I'll only say this once! You've really saved me a lot!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Because you were in the center of my heart, waving that 'don't lose' flag for me—

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Because you kept pushing me forward, I think that's why I was able to keep trying!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...Was I pushing Nature's back?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Yeah, that's right.

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: It's because it was you that you could push her back!

text_block_list.name: Yayoi Akikawa
text_block_list.text: First, I want you to believe that more than anyone!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...I see. So that's how it was. I was pushing her.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: It feels warm. Ahaha. So, this is what it's like.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ...? What's up?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Alright, Nature... let's go!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh, what's the sudden rush?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: We're having a match, right? I won't lose, you know!

And so, in the middle of the twilight ground,
the race between the two began.

text_block_list.name: The Two
text_block_list.text: Haaaah!!

They overtook each other again and again.
Each time, their speed increased.

Even from a distance, it was clear—this was a full-throttle race,
unlike the playful start it seemed to be.

Suddenly, I noticed one Umamusume
staring intently at such a race.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I won't lose, I won't lose, I won't lose...!
Me too!

text_block_list.name: The Two
text_block_list.text: Daaaaaaaah——!

The sunset sky enveloped the two
as they dove for the finish and tumbled onto the turf.

The wish once cast by Chairman Yayoi Akikawa
might be slowly taking root and sprouting—
perhaps.
